subject: COMPETE (Bug) / Competitiveness Chart Spinning Wheels
description:
Happy New Year!

On the dashboard, my competitiveness chart seems to constantly spin without offering an actual chart. I normally use Chrome, but I also tried IE. No luck.

R. Todd Smith, CCR

Director of Campus Store Services

The Loch Shop @ Clayton State University

2000 Clayton State Blvd., Edgewater Hall

Morrow GA 30260

p) 678-466-4220; f) 678-466-4214

www.ishoplochshop.com (http://www.ishoplochshop.com/)

“LIKE” US ON FACEBOOK:

http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Loch-Shop/166864463376163

assignee.name: Marissa Djafroodi
assignee.signature:
Best,

Marissa Djafroodi

Verba | VitalSource

415.738.2374

comments.body:
Hi Todd,

I see exactly what you mean and it looks like this is a bug.  I am going to pass this over to our tech team so they can take a look into what is happening here.

I will let you know as soon as I hear back from them.  In the meantime, let me know if you need anything else.

Best,

Marissa Djafroodi
Customer Support Analyst
Verba Software
marissa.djafroodi@verbasoftware.com
415.738.2374

By the way, just a reminder, the Inaugural Textbook Affordability Conference and our Verba Boot Camp are coming up. For information on attendance, please see the following here:

VBC website: http://www.verbasoftware.com/vbc2015

VBC registration: https://www.regonline.com/Register/Checkin.aspx?EventID=1649245

TAC website: http://www.tac2015.com/

TAC registation: https://www.regonline.com/Register/Checkin.aspx?EventId=1648727

Please note that hotel rooms are booking up fast and the ICBA $169/night rate at the Sheraton will expire by January 7th, so book your hotel here, using group code: ICBA.

If there are any questions or issues with booking or registration, please e-mail

brooke.spreckman@verbasoftware.com.

comments.body:
==CONTEXT==

Product:  Compete
Compete login/Collect URL:  clayton (but also true for all users)
Term/Catalog: Spring 2015 (Auto)

https://www.verbacompete.com/admin/user/268/catalog/9132?redirect_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.verbacompete.com%2Fdashboard


==ISSUE==
When a user navigates to the Dashboard, the Competitiveness Chart spins its wheels and either does not load or it takes so long to load (almost a minute) they have moved on to another page/screen.  


==USE CASE==
Assuming the role of a user/client, create a step by step run through of EXACTLY how you create the issue:

1. Log into Compete, user:  clayton
2. Navigate to the Dashboard
3. Wait for Competitiveness Chart to load

EXPECTED RESULTS: 
The chart would load within a reasonable amount of time

ACTUAL RESULTS: 
The chart lags and does not load within a reasonable timeframe
